code: import React from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const COLS=7;const ROWS=6;export default function Tabuleiro(_ref){let{tab,onPlay,vencedor,verdeSpots=[]}=_ref;const isVerde=(r,c)=>verdeSpots.includes("".concat(r,",").concat(c));return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"tabuleiro "+(vencedor?'vencedor':''),role:"grid","aria-label":"Tabuleiro de Conecta 4",children:Array.from({length:COLS}).map((_,col)=>{return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"coluna","data-col":col,"data-col-index":col,onClick:()=>onPlay(col),children:Array.from({length:ROWS}).map((_,rowIdx)=>{const r=rowIdx;const cell=tab[r][col];const verde=isVerde(r,col);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"celula "+(cell?'occupied':'')+(verde?' verde':''),children:[verde&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"green-indicator","aria-hidden":true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"token "+(cell?cell:'vazio')})]},rowIdx);})},col);})});}
